name: Vespenate the Spinbreaker
text:
2 Level 5 monsters
Once per turn, you can also Xyz Summon "Vespenate the Spinbreaker" by using 1 Rank 4 Xyz Monster you control as material. (Transfer its materials to this card.) Cannot be used as Xyz Material the turn it is Xyz Summoned. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage. If this Xyz Summoned card in its owner's control is destroyed by an opponent's card: You can target 1 Level 5 or lower monster in your GY; Special Summon it. You can only use this effect of "Vespenate the Spinbreaker" once per turn.
